T02D2064:155b-1: aa pa r'a dzi ta n'a ma s'a dha nam /
T02D2064:155b-3: gzhan gyis mi thub pa zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs /
T02D2064:155b-6: dpal rdo rje 'chang gi mdun du 'phags pa gshin
T02D2064:155b-7: rje gshed kyi rnal 'byor pas bsnyen bkur pa 'bum
T02D2064:155b-9: de nas nya'i dus su mchod pa chen po byas
T02D2064:155b-10: la zan dkar mo dang zho dang bu ram dang
T02D2064:155b-11: / 'o ma 'dres pa'i 'bras thug gi gtor ma byas la gu gul gyi spos dbul zhing //
T02D2064:156a-0: @156a * // mtshan lam gyis bzlas pas tho rangs 'ong bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2064:156a-1: ma 'ongs na kho nar 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2064:156a-2: byung nas ci bya zhes zer na bdag gi khol po gyis shig ces brjod do //
T02D2064:156a-3: de nas khol bo'i las thams cad byed pa dang /
T02D2064:156a-4: rig 'dzin gyi rgyal por byed pa dang /
T02D2064:156a-5: dgra thams cad gsod par byed pa dang /
T02D2064:156a-6: zla ba'i lha mo yang bkug nas ster ba dang /
T02D2064:156a-7: khur nas lha'i yul ston pa dang /
T02D2064:156a-8: lha'i dbang por byed pa dang /
T02D2064:156a-9: tshe bskal pa bdun du gnas par byed par 'gyur ro //
